comments.body: what's the difference between 0 and no permits? (I'm referencing the test you added above)

The "no permits" one tests the `Left(_)` case form https://github.com/typelevel/cats-effect/blob/master/core/shared/src/main/scala/cats/effect/concurrent/Semaphore.scala#L280

So having 0 permits leads to `Right` state AFAIU, which this test case suppose to cover

I'm referring to https://codecov.io/gh/typelevel/cats-effect/src/master/core/shared/src/main/scala/cats/effect/concurrent/Semaphore.scala
